promptText:
Verbavid: AI-powered text-to-video platform.
Transforms text reports into engaging videos.
Automates summarization, narration, and visuals.
Addresses the shift to video content consumption.
Solves challenges of time, cost, and skills.
Improves information retention and engagement.
User-friendly interface for non-technical users.
MERN stack, Cloudinary, MongoDB used in development.
Incremental SDLC model for efficient development.
Comprehensive testing ensures quality and reliability.
Future scope includes multilingual support and real-time editing.
AI-driven customization enhances video personalization.
Platform bridges gap between text and video.
Empowers users to create professional-quality videos.
Increases content reach and audience engagement.
Detailed UML diagrams visualize system design.
